BeamCalc
Class CoordinateSystem

java.lang.Object
  BeamCalc.CoordinateSystem

public class CoordinateSystem
extends java.lang.Object

This class implements a Coordinate System, and contains the methods necessary for the translation of one vector from a CS to another

Author:
Enrique Ramos
